actionCalls.name: myRule_1_A1
actionCalls.label: Send Email Notes to BPREP PWM

actionCalls.name: myRule_3_A1
actionCalls.label: Send Meeting notes to BCP V PWM

actionCalls.name: myRule_5_A1
actionCalls.label: Send Email Notes to BSIP PWM

actionCalls.name: myRule_7_A1
actionCalls.label: Send Email alert to PWM PMT

actionCalls.name: myRule_9_A1
actionCalls.label: Send Meeting Notes to PFG PWM BOZ

rules.name: myRule_1
rules.label: Has BPREP Desc Been Updated for PW?

rules.name: myRule_3
rules.label: Has BCP V Desc been updated for PW?

rules.name: myRule_5
rules.label: Has BSIP Desc been updated for PW?

rules.name: myRule_7
rules.label: Has BIF IV Desc been Updated for PW?

rules.name: myRule_9
rules.label: Has BOZ Desc been updated for PWM?

Flow.description: SS: 12/11 removed additional notes as this is duplicate rule of PFG PMT Meeting Notes. .....old.....Removed 3rd Node Is New Event and separated as new PB due to Deployment Issues in ORG 11/26

value.stringValue: AND (NOT(ISBLANK( [Event].Opportunity__c )), (ISCHANGED([Event].Description) || ISNEW()), [Event].EndDateTime < Now(), [Event].Opportunity__c.Investment_Vehicle__c.Name = "BPREP", OR( ISPICKVAL([Event].Opportunity__c.Account.Investor_Type__c , "Multi Family Office"), ISPICKVAL([Event].Opportunity__c.Account.Investor_Type__c , "UHNW"), ISPICKVAL([Event].Opportunity__c.Account.Investor_Type__c , "Single Family Office"), ISPICKVAL([Event].Opportunity__c.Account.Investor_Type__c , "Private Bank / Wirehouse"), ISPICKVAL([Event].Opportunity__c.Account.Investor_Type__c , "RIA / Wealth Manager") ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_1
formulas.expression: AND (NOT(ISBLANK( {!myVariable_current.Opportunity__c} )), (ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Description}) || ISNEW()), {!myVariable_current.EndDateTime} < Now(), {!myVariable_current.Opportunity__r.Investment_Vehicle__r.Name} = "BPREP", OR( ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Opportunity__r.Account.Investor_Type__c} , "Multi Family Office"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Opportunity__r.Account.Investor_Type__c} , "UHNW"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Opportunity__r.Account.Investor_Type__c} , "Single Family Office"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Opportunity__r.Account.Investor_Type__c} , "Private Bank / Wirehouse"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Opportunity__r.Account.Investor_Type__c} , "RIA / Wealth Manager") ) )

value.stringValue: AND (NOT(ISBLANK( [Event].Opportunity__c )), (ISCHANGED([Event].Description) || ISNEW()), [Event].EndDateTime < Now(), [Event].Opportunity__c.Investment_Vehicle__c.Name = "BCP V", OR( ISPICKVAL([Event].Opportunity__c.Account.Investor_Type__c , "Multi Family Office"), ISPICKVAL([Event].Opportunity__c.Account.Investor_Type__c , "UHNW"), ISPICKVAL([Event].Opportunity__c.Account.Investor_Type__c , "Single Family Office"), ISPICKVAL([Event].Opportunity__c.Account.Investor_Type__c , "Private Bank / Wirehouse"), ISPICKVAL([Event].Opportunity__c.Account.Investor_Type__c , "RIA / Wealth Manager") ) )
